session
*******


Description
===========

A bastion session resource. A bastion session lets authorized users
connect to a target resource using a Secure Shell (SSH) for a
predetermined amount of time.


Available Commands
==================

* create

* create-managed-ssh

* create-port-forwarding

* create-session-create-dynamic-port-forwarding-session-target-
  resource-details

* delete

* get

* list

* update
